This ancient orichalcum suit of barding provides unmatched protection for those honest enough to shoulder its burden. There\'s no saddle, but it has a linked helm that prevents unicorns from wearing it.
Unicorns can\'t wear this barding! The helmet is permanently fixed to the neck plate, and there is no room for a horn.
You need to be wearing this barding to use its special power!
This lightweight barding offers basic protection. It\'s so light, even dishonest ne\'er-do-well\'s can use it with little difficulty.
With the help of this mantle, the elf can summon the forces of nature itself. High grass will grow in the blink of an eye even through solid stone, immobilizing all enemies in sight.
Only elves can use this armor!
A yoked farmer can harvest grass. Once harvest begins, stepping on tall grass will satisfy hunger. Eating grass doesn\'t count as eating a piece of food, so it won\'t restore health.
Only farmers can use this armor!

A huntress in such cloak can create a fan of spectral blades. Each of these blades will target a single enemy in the huntress\'s field of view, inflicting damage depending on her currently equipped melee weapon.
Only huntresses can use this armor!
This barding is made from tightly-woven and treated cloth, and it features a brass saddle. The purpose of saddles is a mystery to you.
Wearing this gorgeous robe, a mage can cast a spell of molten earth: all the enemies in his field of view will be set on fire and will be unable to move at the same time.
Only mages can use this armor!
Interlocking metal links make for a tough but flexible suit of barding.
Enormous plates of metal are joined together to form this heavy barding designed only for the honest and true. It features a steel saddle.
Wearing this dark garb, a rogue can perform a trick called \"smoke bomb\" (though no real explosives are used): he blinds enemies who can see him and jumps aside.
Only rogues can use this armor!
You can only jump to an empty location in your field of view
Choose a location to jump to
The metal scales sewn onto a pleather vest create a flexible, yet protective barding. It also features a red pleather saddle.
While this armor looks heavy, it allows a warrior to perform a heroic leap towards a targeted location, slamming down to stun all neighbouring enemies.
Only warriors can use this armor!
